channel.title: CVE Feed for Facebook -- Oculus Desktop
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Facebook -- Oculus Desktop

item.title: CVE-2021-24038|2024-08-03T19:21:17.297Z -- facebook -- oculus%20desktop
item.description: Due to a bug with management of handles in OVRServiceLauncher.exe, an attacker could expose a privileged process handle to an unprivileged process, leading to local privilege escalation. This issue affects Oculus Desktop versions after 1.39 and prior to 31.1.0.67.507.
